'''Genta''' is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in the [[Taurus Iracundus Chapter]], Act I: [[Rise Up, Golden Soul]].

He first appeared in ''[https://youtu.be/KGjnRThxe7k Character Teaser - "Arataki Itto: That's How the Show Should Go!"]'' alongside fellow [[Arataki Gang]] members [[Akira]] and [[Mamoru]].
